Sentencas: Screen-printing technology is widely used in the field of gas sensors and can also be used to fabricate electrodes for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Compatibility of screen-printing technology with micro-hotplate for gas sensor and solid oxide micro fuel cell development

Sentencas: The compatibility of this technique with micro-hotplate is studied to produce micro sensors and micro SOFC.
Titulo: Compatibility of screen-printing technology with micro-hotplate for gas sensor and solid oxide micro fuel cell development

Sentencas: For sensors application, development of inks containing precursor of sensing element allows to decrease annealing temperature and to improve adhesion.
Titulo: Compatibility of screen-printing technology with micro-hotplate for gas sensor and solid oxide micro fuel cell development

Sentencas: For SOFC development, we investigated a new type of device named single-chamber fuel cell (SCFC) for which the fuel and the oxygen are mixed and in contact with both the anode and cathode.
Titulo: Compatibility of screen-printing technology with micro-hotplate for gas sensor and solid oxide micro fuel cell development

Sentencas: Such devices were firstly built at a millimeter scale using LSM for cathode, YSZ for electrolyte and Ni-YSZ cermet for anode.
Titulo: Compatibility of screen-printing technology with micro-hotplate for gas sensor and solid oxide micro fuel cell development

Sentencas: Two types of configuration were studied: SCFC developed on YSZ support with screen-printed electrodes, and SCFC entirely manufactured by screen-printing on a inert ceramic substrate made of alumina.
Titulo: Compatibility of screen-printing technology with micro-hotplate for gas sensor and solid oxide micro fuel cell development

Sentencas: Although weak power densities were measured, around I mW/cm(2), the feasibility of SCFC was confirmed.
Titulo: Compatibility of screen-printing technology with micro-hotplate for gas sensor and solid oxide micro fuel cell development

Sentencas: Then, preliminary results concerning LSM cathode deposition on micro-hotplate were obtained.
Titulo: Compatibility of screen-printing technology with micro-hotplate for gas sensor and solid oxide micro fuel cell development

Sentencas: LSM layers annealed up to 800 degrees C resist well to temperature cycling but exhibit low conductivity.
Titulo: Compatibility of screen-printing technology with micro-hotplate for gas sensor and solid oxide micro fuel cell development
